zones.name: Metro Cities (Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru, Chennai, Kolkata, Hyderabad)

shippingPolicy:
## Shipping Policy

We ship across India and internationally. Domestic orders are dispatched within 1-2 business days. International orders are dispatched within 2-3 business days.

### Free Shipping
Free shipping on all domestic orders above ₹499 and international orders above $50.

### Cash on Delivery
COD is available for domestic orders between ₹200 and ₹25,000 with a flat ₹40 COD fee.

### Delivery Times
- Metro Cities: 2-4 business days
- Tier 2 Cities: 4-6 business days
- Rest of India: 5-8 business days
- International: 10-18 business days

### Tracking
All orders come with tracking. You will receive a tracking link via email and SMS once your order is shipped.
